attributes.action: Give the UK electorate a referendum on the proposed new EU treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime minister promised the UK electorate a referendum on the EU constitution, The EU leaders are attempting to push through an amending treaty which Tony Blair has stated he will not offer to the people in the form of a referendum.
We should have a referendum on any form of treaty or constitution

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
